member.name: T:NHaml.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.AttributesParseError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error parsing attributes.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.CompilationError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An error occurred when compiling the file: {0}.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.ErrorParsingTag
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error parsing tag.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.IllegalIndentationSpaces
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Illegal Indentation: Only {0} space character(s) allowed as indentation.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.IllegalIndentationTabs
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Illegal Indentation: Only tabs allowed as indentation.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.InvalidTemplateBaseType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to TemplateBaseType must inherit from CompiledTemplate.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.InvariantFail
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invariant Failure.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.NoPartialName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No partial name specified and template is not a layout.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.NotAssignableToITemplateCompiler
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Type {0} is not assignable to ITemplateCompiler.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.ObjectNull
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected Not Null Object.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.StringCannotBeEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The provided string argument "{0}" cannot be empty.

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.SyntaxError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Syntax error on line {0}: {1}: "{2}".

member.name: P:NHaml.Properties.Resources.TemplateCompilerTypeNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to TemplateCompiler type {0} not found.
